add_cd_algorithm(algorithm, parameters)[source]

Add an algorithm to a dictionary of algorithms.

Input: - algorithm: A string representing the name of the algorithm. - parameters: A dictionary containing the parameters for the algorithm.

Output: None

init_configurations_for_algorithm(algorithm, configurations)[source]

Initializes all possible parameter values for each algorithm in a dictionary.

Input: - algorithm (str): name of the algorithm - configurations (dict): dictionary of configurations for the given algorithm

Output: None

Raises: Exception: If the algorithm does not exist or the configurations for the algorithm have already been initialized

Input: None Output: None

Adds more parameters/values for a given algorithm.

Input: - algorithm (str): name of the algorithm - parameters (dict): dictionary of parameters for the given algorithm

Output: None

return_number_of_executed_conf()[source]

Input: None

Output: - int: the number of configurations that have already run

check_all_conf_executed()[source]

Checks whether all possible configurations have run.

Input: None

Output: - bool: True if all possible configurations have run, False otherwise

return_remaining_conf()[source]

Returns all remaining configurations to be executed.

Input: None

Output: - list: list of remaining configurations to be executed
